text: The Administrative Records Experiment was a project designed to explore technical alternatives to the 2010 United States Census. ==See== * Reengineering the 2010 Census: Risks and Challenges. Administrative Records Experiment in 2000 (AREX 2000): Household Level Analysis. Census 2000 Experiment Report. Washington, DC: U.S. Census Bureau. Category:United States Census
title: Administrative Records Experiment
